name: Raw Dataset and Interview Codebook for "Moral Distress Among Consumer Health Information Professionals: An Exploratory Study"

creator.name: O'Hanlon, Robin
creator.affiliation: Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center Library

description: Two files contain: 1. Raw survey data collected in 2020 to measure the experience of moral distress and ethical dilemmas by Consumer Health Information Professionals (CHIPS). 2. The interview codebook used in this same study.

citation.text: O'Hanlon, R., Angell, K., and Walsh, S. (2021). Moral Distress Among Consumer Health Information Professionals: An Exploratory Study. Evidence Based Library and Information Practice, 16(2).
